rpgonline.bullet

Class BulletState

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.newdawn.slick.state.BasicGameState
      • rpgonline.bullet.BulletState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.newdawn.slick.ControlledInputReciever, org.newdawn.slick.ControllerListener, org.newdawn.slick.InputListener, org.newdawn.slick.KeyListener, org.newdawn.slick.MouseListener, org.newdawn.slick.state.GameState, BaseScaleState

    public abstract class BulletState
extends org.newdawn.slick.state.BasicGameState
implements BaseScaleState
    A state for bullet based games.
    Author:
    Tomas
